definition: to be industrious, rising early and going to bed late

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group
early/morning/Good morning!/long ago/prematurely
to have a voracious desire for/to covet/greedy/corrupt
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
black/dark/sinister/secret/shady/illegal/to hide (sth) away/to vilify/(loanword) to hack (computing)

sentences.english: The husband worked day and night to support the family, but with no care of his wife.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫为了养家起早贪黑以至于没有多关心他的妻子。

sentences.english: There was once a poor woodcutter who toiled from early morning till late at night.
sentences.chinese: 从前有个穷樵夫，天天起早贪黑地劳作。

sentences.english: When you were little, mom and dad went out to sell at night and came back at morning…
sentences.chinese: 在你小的时候，妈妈和爸爸总是起早贪黑的工作。

sentences.english: Yeah, I'll miss the boredom and the freedom and the time spent alone.
sentences.chinese: 我会想想起早贪黑和无拘无束的时光。

sentences.english: Consciousness will never agree to work 9 to 5.
sentences.chinese: 意识从不会同意朝九晚五，起早贪黑。

sentences.english: She gets up very early and sleeps very late every day. She works hard, yet without complaining.
sentences.chinese: 她每天起早贪黑，辛苦地工作，从无怨言。

sentences.english: Peasants work from dawn to dusk all the year round.
sentences.chinese: 农民整年起早贪黑地劳动。

definition: see 起早貪黑|起早贪黑[qi3 zao3 tan1 hei1]
to leave early and return late (idiom)
exhausting/hard/tough/arduous/to work hard/to go to a lot of trouble/hardship(s)
to tire oneself out through overwork/to work oneself to death
to travel or work through night and day/to toil away for long hours
day and night/regardless of the time of day or night
to support one's family (idiom); to have difficulty feeding a family
hardworking/industrious
to rush about/to be constantly on the move
laborious
to be busy rushing about/to bustle about
to work/to be employed
face to the ground, back to the sky
pinyin: mian4 chao2 huang2 tu3 bei4 chao2 tian1

definition: regardless of weather conditions/rain, hail or shine
to make money
to scrape a meager living/to get by with difficulty
variant of 糊口[hu2 kou3]
